page.description: A control for adding server-side Charts to a UX Component.

section.title: Contrasting Chart Control with the Javascript Chart Control

description.p: The *[ui:Chart]* controls is a server-side control. The chart is rendered as a bitmap on the server and then the client-displays the bitmap image. Because the *[ui:Chart]* control is a server-side control, it is not suited for disconnected applications. Also, since the *[ui:Chart]* control is a server-side control, it will be slower than *[ui:Javascript Charts]*. See the [Javascript Chart] control to add client-side charting to your component.
